metadata.title: CVE-2016-9536 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
tools/tiff2pdf.c in libtiff 4.0.6 has out-of-bounds write vulnerabilitiesin heap allocated buffers in t2p_process_jpeg_strip(). Reported as MSVR35098, aka "t2p_process_jpeg_strip heap-buffer-overflow."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9536` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6').
